solution_line_template: For the box with a capacity of {capacity_box1}, if it was {fill_fraction_box1} full with oranges, it had {fill_fraction_box1}*{capacity_box1} = <<{capacity_box1}*{fill_fraction_box1}={oranges_box1}>>{oranges_box1} oranges.

The second box, with a capacity of {capacity_box2}, was {fill_fraction_box2} full with oranges, which totals {fill_fraction_box2}*{capacity_box2} = <<{fill_fraction_box2}*{capacity_box2}={oranges_box2}>>{oranges_box2} oranges.
Together, the two boxes have {oranges_box1}+{oranges_box2} = <<{oranges_box1}+{oranges_box2}={total_oranges}>>{total_oranges} oranges
